front.title: Improving Support for Multi-Router and Multi-Prefix IPv6 Networks

abstract.t: This document specifies a improvements to IPv6 Stateless Address Autoncofiguration (SLAAC) to fully support common multi-router and multi-prefix scenarios. It formally updates RFC 4191, RFC 4861, RFC 4862, and RFC 8504, and obsoletes RFC 8028, such that these scenarios are properly supported by IPv6 host implementations.
